typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExcelDS
DSConditionSplit@StartC derive(DateColumn = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
ExcelDS split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: true) ~> DSConditionSplit@(StartC)
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['sample.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
